methodology.claim_detection: Sentence-level heuristic: triggers (will/must/ensure/etc.) OR numeric tokens.
methodology.evidence_detection: Page-level heuristic: presence of evidence markers (source/appendix/study/data/url/etc.).
methodology.support_logic: SUPPORTED if evidence markers present; WEAK if generic/marketing language with only page-level markers; PARTIAL if mechanism described without supporting calc; UNSUPPORTED if no evidence markers on page.
methodology.structural_coherence: Explainable proxy score penalizing unsupported claims and overconfidence-without-evidence.
methodology.note: This is a structural screening tool, not a judgment of the underlying project quality.

disclaimer: Public-document demonstration. Results are heuristic and intended for assurance triage; not financial advice.
